item.title: Public Attestation
item.description: You may wish to attest information to the general public, without the need for viewers to log-in to their RKVST account. Public Assets can be used to publicly assert data, also referred to as Public Attestation. For example, you may attest to data containing a vulnerability report against an OpenSource software package or the maintenance records for a building. Permissioned Assets can only be shared through the creation of Access Policies.
